1.content: Choose the website of your favorite streamer.
1.title: Intro

11.content: Who are you shrunken by?
11.title: YouTube

12.content: Who are you shrunken by?
12.title: Twitch Streamers

121.content:
You're in your room, browsing twitch for something to watch. You click on a popular streamer called STPeach playing League of legends, and your greeted by one of the most beautiful girls you've ever seen. You intently watch the stream for about an hour or so and decide to go to bed. You drift of to sleep thinking about the girl you saw on that stream. When you wake up you notice your bed feels harder and your blankets are gone. You open your eyes and realize your not in your room at all. You can see for what seems to be miles in every direction and the ground seems to be made of some coarse fiber. As you're gathering in your surroundings you hear a low rumble.

boom

Boom

BOOM

The sound is growing louder and you can feel the earth start to shake, an earthquake you think. Off in the distance you notice a gigantic figure growing closer, but its too far away to make out. Soon enough it grows closer, and you realize its the streamer you saw the night before. She's giant you think to your self. As you look around more you notice what looks to be giant bed and furniture. She's not giant, you've shrunk. By your estimations you realize you must be only 3 or 4 inches tall. During this time of spacing out you realize she's almost on top of you. She stops about a regular size foot away from you, you look up and see her wearing https://www.instagram.com/p/B0RBUQQAA1W/... you have to act fast, what do you do?
121.title: STPeach

info.brief_description: Stories about being shrunk by your favorite streamers.
info.description: Anyone's free to add, just please use good grammar, and avoid one sentence chapters as much as possible.
